definition: drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell

sentences.english: Encourage her release by constructing an erotic fantasy before things heat up.
sentences.chinese: 应当在高潮激发前鼓励她通过性幻想放松自己。

sentences.english: This system encourages not only internal promotions but lateral moves as well.
sentences.chinese: 该系统不仅鼓励内部升职也支持平职调换。

sentences.english: Encourage South Korea ball exercises, collision Chinese fishing boats.
sentences.chinese: 鼓励南韩实弹演习，冲撞中国渔船。

sentences.english: Has the purple devoted to encourage and comfort can only temporarily soothe her injured heart.
sentences.chinese: 曾紫陌的鼓励和安慰也只能暂时稍稍安抚她受伤的心。

sentences.english: Other ideas include encouraging guests to reuse towels and linens.
sentences.chinese: 其他措施包括鼓励客人重复使用毛巾和床单。

sentences.english: Encourage them to integrate forests into their publicity or philanthropic work.
sentences.chinese: 鼓励他们将森林问题纳入其宣传或慈善工作。

sentences.english: We thank many listeners who write to us and encourage us.
sentences.chinese: 很感谢有不少听友写信来给我们，鼓励我们。

sentences.english: But I do encourage you during that phrase, you need someone to talk to.
sentences.chinese: 不过我鼓励你们在那个阶段中，需要找个人倾诉一下。

sentences.english: So, WCG sends full support and cheering to our best gamers.
sentences.chinese: 现在，WCG将支持和鼓励送给你们。

sentences.english: Jesus did this with the Apostle Peter.
sentences.chinese: 主耶稣也是这样鼓励使徒彼得。

sentences.english: Encouragement also needs to be regular- don't be stingy with your encouragement.
sentences.chinese: 也需要经常鼓励他人，不要吝惜。

sentences.english: In doing this, more people will be inspired and encouraged to write.
sentences.chinese: 如此抛砖引玉，能激发与鼓励更多人加入写作队伍。

sentences.english: We encourage normal intercourse, and oppose love triangles.
sentences.chinese: 我们鼓励正常的交往，反对三角恋爱。

sentences.english: The staff wanted him to live and prayed with him everyday.
sentences.chinese: 工作人员鼓励他活下去，并每天与他一道做祈祷。

sentences.english: A foreign party is encouraged to deposit in the Bank of China any part of foreign exchange which he is entitled to remit abroad.
sentences.chinese: 鼓励外国合营者将可汇出的外汇存入中国银行。

sentences.english: Farmers, encouraged by high prices, have been planting more grain.
sentences.chinese: 农民受高物价鼓励，已经种植了更多的作物。

definition: to be in favor of/to support/to back/support/backing/to stand by/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 給予|给予[ji3 yu3]
to praise/to approve of/to show approval
to show concern and care for
to spur on/to urge on/to encourage sb (e.g. to make progress)
to be concerned about/to care about
